_meanings:
[{#ud-As#}] To be
indifferent or unconcerned, be 
careless or apathetic; to be passive or
inactive; {#tatkimityudAsate BaratAH#}
<ls>Māl. 1</ls>; {#viDAya vEraM sAmarze naro'rO ya#} 
{#udAsate#} <ls>Śi. 2. 42</ls>; <ls>Bg. 9. 9</ls>; Sān.
<ls>K. 20</ls>; not to share in, show no
interest in; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls>
